learnMore.title: How Kairos Compass Works
learnMore.description: Your automated guide to a fulfilling career path.
learnMore.flowDescription: We guide you from self-discovery to a concrete action plan in three simple steps.
learnMore.step1_text: Start with our interactive Ikigai Canvas. It's a space for you to articulate what you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, and what you can be paid for. This creates a unique profile that powers our AI.
learnMore.step2_text: Our AI analyzes your Ikigai profile and suggests careers that truly align with you. You'll see a personalized "fit score" and a detailed explanation for each match.
learnMore.step3_text: Once you pick a career, our AI generates a specific, step-by-step 3-year plan to help you achieve it. No more guesswork‚Äîjust a clear path forward.
learnMore.featuresDescription: We use smart technology to make your career planning journey seamless.
learnMore.feature1_text: An interactive canvas to input your passions, skills, values, and interests.
learnMore.feature2_text: Use voice commands or text to interact with the app and fill out your journal entries.
learnMore.feature3_text: Our AI analyzes your profile to match you with careers from our curated database.
learnMore.feature4_text: Keep a daily journal to reflect on your thoughts and feelings. Our AI analyzes your entries to provide career insights based on your mood and recurring themes.
learnMore.feature5_text: Our AI extracts key themes (e.g., 'Tech', 'Arts', 'Science') from your profile to provide more nuanced and accurate career recommendations. This avoids generic matches and focuses on what truly drives you.
learnMore.feature6_text: Get a customized 3-phase roadmap with specific tasks, timelines, and resources for your chosen career path.
learnMore.heroTitle: How KAIROS Fixes Common Career Guidance Problems
learnMore.heroSubtitle: Traditional career tools often show generic results. KAIROS uses AI to provide personalized, actionable career guidance based on your unique profile.
learnMore.problemSolutionDesc: How KAIROS addresses common issues with career matching tools
learnMore.problem1_desc: Instead of showing 50% for every career, KAIROS analyzes your unique profile themes to provide accurate scores.
learnMore.problem2_desc: Get a customized roadmap with specific tasks, timelines, and resources for your chosen career path.
learnMore.problem3_desc: AI analyzes your unique combination of passions, skills, values, and interests for tailored recommendations.
learnMore.howItWorksTip1: Tip: The more detailed your profile, the more accurate your career matches will be. This prevents generic 50% scores.
learnMore.howItWorksTip2: How it works: Each career gets a unique score based on theme matching (Tech, Science, Arts, etc.), not a fixed percentage.
learnMore.howItWorksTip3: Result: A personalized 3-phase action plan with specific tasks, resources, and timelines for your chosen career path.
learnMore.startWithStep1: Start with Step 1: Create Your Profile
learnMore.faqDesc: Understanding the technology behind accurate career matching
learnMore.faq1_a: KAIROS uses theme extraction and keyword analysis to match your profile with career requirements. Each career gets a unique score based on how well your themes (Tech, Science, Arts, etc.) align with the career's requirements.
learnMore.faq2_q: What makes the action plans personalized?
learnMore.faq2_a: Plans are generated based on your specific education level, existing skills, and career goals. AI creates 3-phase roadmaps with timeline-adjusted tasks and resources tailored to your starting point.
learnMore.faq3_a: AI analyzes keywords in your profile to identify dominant themes. For example, mentions of "code," "programming," and "software" trigger the "Tech" theme, which influences matching with tech-related careers.

education.title: Stage-Specific Opportunities & Guidance
education.description: Actionable advice tailored to your current academic or professional stage.

highSchool.title: For High School Students
highSchool.fundamentals_text: Build a strong foundation in math, physics, and programming (Python). Participate in National Olympiad in Informatics (NOI) or Youth Science & Technology Innovation Competitions.
highSchool.exploration_text: Look into special programs at top universities (e.g., Tsinghua, Peking University, USTC) and attend online science camps.
highSchool.handsOn_text: Learn through Bilibili, Chinese University MOOC platforms, and try small projects with open-source hardware (e.g., Arduino).

undergrad.title: For Undergraduate Students
undergrad.specialize_text: Aim to join national key laboratories or participate in industry collaboration projects with professors.
undergrad.competitions_text: Join competitions like the "Internet+" Innovation & Entrepreneurship Competition or National College Electronic Design Contest, and obtain industry-recognized certifications (e.g., Huawei HCIA, Alibaba Cloud ACA).
undergrad.internship_text: Target internships at leading companies in Greater Bay Area, Yangtze River Delta during holidays.
undergrad.studies_text: Consider postgraduate recommendations, domestic Master's programs (985/211 universities), or apply to overseas universities (Singapore, Hong Kong, Europe). Also watch for early recruitment by state-owned enterprises.

masters_phd.title: For Master's/PhD Students
masters_phd.research_text: Choose thesis topics aligned with national strategic priorities (e.g., AI, chips, new energy), aiming for high-quality publications or patents.
masters_phd.collaboration_text: Apply for joint training programs (e.g., Huawei "Genius Youngster", Alibaba Star Program) to work on core R&D.
masters_phd.global_text: Attend top conferences (e.g., NeurIPS, ISSCC), explore CSC scholarships for study abroad, and build an international network.
masters_phd.employment_text: Target R&D roles in state-owned enterprise research institutes (e.g., CETC, CASIC), top private company labs, or Chinese branches of global tech firms.

cloud_cyber.title: Field Intelligence: Cloud & Cybersecurity
cloud_cyber.innovation_text:
- **Cloud Architect:** Rise of **multi-cloud and hybrid strategies**; growing demand for **FinOps and cloud cost optimization** skills.
- **Cyber Security Analyst:** Increased focus on **AI-driven threat detection**, **zero-trust frameworks**, and **cloud security posture management**.
cloud_cyber.market_text:
- **Job Growth:** Cloud roles up 18%; cybersecurity roles up 15%.
- **Hot Skills:** AWS/Azure/GCP certs, DevSecOps, incident response, compliance (GDPR, CCPA).
- **Hiring Hubs:** Remote-friendly, but strong in **Dallas, D.C., Bangalore, and Singapore**.

data_ai.title: Field Intelligence: Data Science & AI
data_ai.innovation_text:
- **Data Scientist:** Shift toward **MLOps, automated ML (AutoML)**, and **explainable AI (XAI)**.
- **Research Scientist:** Growth in **generative AI, biomedical informatics, and climate modeling**.
data_ai.market_text:
- **Job Growth:** AI/ML roles up 20%.
- **Hot Skills:** Python, SQL, TensorFlow/PyTorch, big data tools (Spark, Hadoop).
- **Hiring Hubs:** **SF Bay Area, NYC, London, Beijing, Bengaluru**.

education_health.title: Field Intelligence: Education & Healthcare
education_health.innovation_text:
- **High School Teacher:** Rise of **edtech tools, personalized learning platforms, and virtual classrooms**.
- **Registered Nurse:** Growth in **telehealth, health informatics, and AI-assisted diagnostics**.
education_health.market_text:
- **Job Growth:** Nursing roles up 12%; teaching roles steady with edtech integration.
- **Hot Skills:** Patient care, classroom tech tools, empathy, communication.
- **Hiring Hubs:** **NYC, Texas, California, urban and rural healthcare networks**.

software_design.title: Field Intelligence: Software & Design
software_design.innovation_text:
- **Software Engineer:** Emphasis on **cloud-native development, microservices, and low-code platforms**.
- **UX Designer:** Growth in **voice/AR/VR interfaces, accessibility design, and design systems**.
software_design.market_text:
- **Job Growth:** Software roles up 15%; UX roles up 18%.
- **Hot Skills:** JavaScript frameworks (React, Node.js), Figma, Agile/Scrum, user research.
- **Hiring Hubs:** **Silicon Valley, Austin, Berlin, Tokyo, Shenzhen**.

marketing_creative.title: Field Intelligence: Marketing & Creative
marketing_creative.innovation_text:
- **Marketing Manager:** Shift toward **AI-driven analytics, hyper-personalization, and influencer marketing automation**.
- **Music Producer:** Rise of **AI music tools, spatial audio, and NFT-based distribution**.
marketing_creative.market_text:
